title: Caipirinha Recipe
full_text:
Caipirinha Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
cachaça
1/2
of a
fresh lime
, cut into quarters
1 to 2
teaspoons
superfine sugar
Directions
Place the lime pieces and sugar in the cocktail shaker and crush with the muddler. Add cachaça and a handful of ice; shake well and pour, unstrained, into a rocks or old fashioned glass.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker
,
cocktail muddler
